self_intro.s1: I am a full-stack software engineer with over <yearLink>{{years}} Years</yearLink> experiences, currently living in Irvine California with my wife. I <codingLink>LOVE coding</codingLink> and help the <helpLink>developer community</helpLink>!

seo_self_intro: Hi This is Marko, I am a full-stack software engineer with over {{years}} years experiences and this is my personal website.
